SELECT COALESCE(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_dt, COALESCE(end_dt, NOW()))), 0) FROM downtime WHERE DATE(start_dt) = CURDATE()
AND machine_id = #{machineId}
SELECT m.machine_name FROM downtime d JOIN machine m ON d.machine_id = m.machine_id GROUP BY m.machine_name ORDER BY SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, d.start_dt, COALESCE(d.end_dt, NOW()))) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT m.machine_name as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM downtime d JOIN machine m ON d.machine_id = m.machine_id WHERE d.error_id != '0000' GROUP BY m.machine_name

SELECT CASE WHEN m.machine_id LIKE '%OVEN%' THEN '오븐' WHEN m.machine_id LIKE '%PAINT%' THEN '스프레이' WHEN m.machine_id LIKE '%DEPO%' THEN '전착' ELSE 'OTHER' END as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM downtime d JOIN machine m ON d.machine_id = m.machine_id WHERE d.error_id != '0000' GROUP BY name
